ygData.subject: Re: ATTACK!
ygData.msgSnippet: Cyanide smirks and turns to Cygnar and then points up. Cyanide: We out number you, out power you, and out gun you. leave now before you die. Cyanides smirk

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster

Cyanide smirks and turns to Cygnar and then points up.

Cyanide: "We out number you, out power you, and out gun you. leave 
now before you die."

Cyanides smirk then turns to a more sinister one.

Cyanide: "Afterall we did all the work. YOu guys sat there getting 
attacked. And if we can't have this base... noone can..."

And with that said Cyanides hands began to crackle with energy once 
more as the sky began to hum as if it was charging.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Cygnar::
>     He flew up to the top of the newly opened Trainer base.  He 
spots Cyanide 
> dropping in and follows him into the hole.  He looks to 
Cyanide.  "I don't 
> think you should be here.  I have every intention of capturing this 
base 
> myself.  Another person would just confuse him."  He nods at 
Ignatius.
